title: New Game Mode: Throwback
body: Riot should add a Throwback game mode to the weekend rotations, allowing summoners to play the original, unmodified champions that we grew to love when we first started League (old Ashe, Galio, Karma, Kat, Soraka, Taric, Vlad, Yorick etc with their traditional skins [as terrible as some of those were...]). It should be set in the old Summoners Rift with all of the old items we loved so much. I think it would be a fun way to see just how far the game play has evolved and would give new players a chance to experience the game us old fogies remember so well.

replies.body: Zephyr Yi, Instant ER Anivia, Sword of the Occult + Mejai Akali..........
also in this new game mode there should be no new champs
